title: JOUR JOUR 390-0-20 Special Topics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Goals of the Practicum:
1. To observe, record and analyze events and processes in the workplace (on-site participation, daily journals).
2. To develop the capacity to make informed responses and to take a proactive role in your current and future organizational experiences (on-site participation, final paper).
3. To gain a better understanding of the processes of the federal government - policy and politics, and the role of the media in reporting on them (speakers, readings).

subject: JOUR
